verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that came to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* against the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, before that \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*.\f + \fr 47.1 \ft Gaza: Heb. Azzah\f*

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Behold, \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* rise \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and shall be an \w overflowing|strong="H7857"\w* \w flood|strong="H5158"\w*, and shall \w overflow|strong="H7857"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and all that is \w therein|strong="H4393"\w*; the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and them that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein: then the \w men|strong="H0120"\w* shall \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*, and all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*.\f + \fr 47.2 \ft all that…: Heb. the fulness thereof\f*

At the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w stamping|strong="H8161"\w* of the \w hoofs|strong="H6541"\w* of his \w strong|strong="H0047"\w* \add horses\add*, at the \w rushing|strong="H7494"\w* of his \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \add and at\add* the \w rumbling|strong="H1995"\w* of his \w wheels|strong="H1534"\w*, the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* shall not look \w back|strong="H6437"\w* to \add their\add* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* for \w feebleness|strong="H7510"\w* of \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*;

Because of the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* to \w spoil|strong="H7703"\w* all the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \add and\add* to cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w Tyrus|strong="H6865"\w* and \w Zidon|strong="H6721"\w* every \w helper|strong="H5826"\w* that \w remaineth|strong="H8300"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w spoil|strong="H7703"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w country|strong="H0339"\w* of \w Caphtor|strong="H3731"\w*.\f + \fr 47.4 \ft the country: Heb. the isle\f*

\w Baldness|strong="H7144"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*; \w Ashkelon|strong="H0831"\w* is cut \w off|strong="H1820"\w* \add with\add* the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of their \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*: how long wilt thou \w cut|strong="H1413"\w* thyself?

\w O|strong="H1945"\w* thou \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, how long \add will it be\add* \w ere|strong="H3808"\w* thou be \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*? put \w up|strong="H0622"\w* thyself into thy \w scabbard|strong="H8593"\w*, \w rest|strong="H7280"\w*, and be \w still|strong="H1826"\w*.\f + \fr 47.6 \ft put…: Heb. gather thyself\f*

How can it be \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*, seeing the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath given it a \w charge|strong="H6680"\w* against \w Ashkelon|strong="H0831"\w*, and against the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w shore|strong="H2348"\w*? there hath he \w appointed|strong="H3259"\w* it.\f + \fr 47.7 \ft How…: Heb. How canst thou\f*
